S.FORM: == 部落地理位置 == kya qutux betunux balay na qalang, cyux maki beh qalang ni Pyasan. 部落地名由來 cingay balay qu kyabil ru Tuba' sraral qasa.nanu yasa lalu Tayal qasa ga Tuba'.
== 部落地理位置 == kya qotox betonox balay na qalang, cyox maki beh qalang ni Pyasan. 部落地名由來 cingay balay qo kyabil ro Toba' sraral qasa.nano yasa lalo Tayal qasa ga Toba'.
